title: How do I back up and restore contacts?
answer:
[Backing up contacts]() 

 Touch Tools > Backup. Accept the User Agreement to start backing up the contacts. 

 Restoring contacts 

 Touch Tools > Backup and select a file in the list. On the Local restore screen, select the items you want to restore and touch RESTORE. 

 Ensure that you have backed up contacts before you restore them.
